Detailed Description

Basic MobileDragon system management.

This instance of System object created by MobileDragon core, and pointer to it is passed to user defined MDGameCreate funtion. Don't delete this object . It stores pointers to render2d, render3d objects, and instances of BtNetwork, Input, SoundSystem classes.
